physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It has a black border serving as its perimeter
 and a black frame encloses the entire photohgraph. The space in between the black border and black frame is white in colour. There are ten railroad tracks in the photograph
 and some of them merge to form a total of six railroad tracks. A train is travelling on one of the tracks that do not merge with the others. A couple of HDB flats can be seen in the background at the top left hand corner of the photograph. On the extreme right of the photograph
 there are trees and a road adjacent to the railroad tracks.
subject_terms_1:locomotives railroads (infrastructure) trains (vehicle groupings) passenger cars (railroad cars)

subject_terms_3:Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Kwek
 Leng Joo Photography
sgcool_label_text:\This image of the locomotive was taken near the Tanjong Pagar Railway Station
 or Keppel Station. It is is part of the \\Tracking Memories\\ collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore

metadata.creator_1: Kwek, Leng Joo Kwek, Leng Joo (TTE)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It has a black border serving as its perimeter, and a black frame encloses the entire photohgraph. The space in between the black border and black frame is white in colour. There are ten railroad tracks in the photograph, and some of them merge to form a total of six railroad tracks. A train is travelling on one of the tracks that do not merge with the others. A couple of HDB flats can be seen in the background at the top left hand corner of the photograph. On the extreme right of the photograph, there are trees and a road adjacent to the railroad tracks.
